title: VAR saves Alisson twice after two red cards in Brazil draw
shortDescription: Brazil had to settle for a 1-1 draw away to Ecuador after Felix Torres' header 15 minutes from time cancelled out an Casemiro's strike in an eventful World Cup qualifier.

title: Guimaraes set for Newcastle medical on Friday ahead of £33m move
shortDescription: Bruno Guimaraes is set to undergo a medical on Friday ahead of completing a £33m move to Newcastle.

title: Papers: Spurs' £48m Diaz deal stalls in agent row
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Friday's national newspapers...

title: Everton to hold talks with final three: Pereira, Lampard, Ferguson
shortDescription: Everton will hold a final round of talks with three candidates for the vacant manager role on Friday, with Vitor Pereira, Frank Lampard and Duncan Ferguson in the frame.

title: Hodgson: I won't knock on owner's door for signings
shortDescription: Watford manager Roy Hodgson insists he is happy to work with the current players at his disposal and won't knock on the owner's door for new signings.

title: Mead magic helps Arsenal beat Brighton to extend WSL lead
shortDescription: Arsenal extended their WSL lead to four points after a Beth Mead-inspired comeback saw them beat Brighton 2-1 at Meadow Park.

title: Man Utd Women sign Bruun | Caldwell, Moore also confirmed
shortDescription: Manchester United Women have signed Lyon forward Signe Bruun on loan, after also completing moves for Diane Caldwell and Jade Moore on Deadline Day in the WSL.

title: Hull appoint Arveladze as head coach
shortDescription: Hull City have announced the appointment of Shota Arveladze as their new head coach on a two-and-a-half-year deal.

title: Liverpool reject Leeds approach for Minamino | Atalanta monitor Origi
shortDescription: Liverpool have rejected initial approaches from Leeds and Monaco for forward Takumi Minamino.

title: Villa sign defender Chambers from Arsenal
shortDescription: Aston Villa have signed Arsenal defender Calum Chambers on a three-and-a-half year deal.

title: CAF doc defends Senegal medical team after Mane head injury
shortDescription: Liverpool do not need to worry about the health of Sadio Mane after the clash of heads that led to his substitution against Cape Verde, says the AFCON tournament doctor.

title: Maternity cover for women players after contract changes
shortDescription: The FA and the PFA have agreed a change to contracts that will see players in the English women's game guaranteed maternity and long-term sickness cover.

title: Prutton's Championship predictions
shortDescription: Who is David Prutton tipping for victory in the Sky Bet Championship this weekend? Find out here...

title: Tottenham continue Diaz talks | Tanganga to stay
shortDescription: Tottenham are continuing talks over a deal for Porto winger Luis Diaz, with the club hoping to make at least one new signing before the transfer window shuts on Monday.

title: Rangers sign Man Utd winger Diallo on loan
shortDescription: Rangers have completed the signing of Amad Diallo on loan from Manchester United.

title: Man City Women sign midfielder Blakstad from Rosenborg
shortDescription: Manchester City have signed midfielder Julie Blakstad from Rosenborg for an undisclosed fee on Women's Super League Deadline Day.

title: Haaland: Vardy inspiration, battling Van Dijk, relaunching rap career
shortDescription: Erling Haaland discusses taking inspiration from Jamie Vardy, a potential reunion of his rap group Flow Kingz and plans to have a farm when he retires.

title: Newcastle in talks with Leverkusen for Bakker
shortDescription: Newcastle United are in talks with Bayer Leverkusen over a deal for left-back Mitchel Bakker.

title: Palace pushing for Van de Beek I Bergkamp triggered talks
shortDescription: Crystal Palace remain in negotiations with Man Utd over a loan move for Donny van de Beek after the father of his girlfriend, Dennis Bergkamp, triggered the talks.

title: When do Chelsea play in the Club World Cup?
shortDescription: This year's Club World Cup, which features Chelsea, will be held in the United Arab Emirates - but when do the Blues play?
